sentences.sContent: To say the movie was bad is an understatement.
sentences.sCn: 说这部电影不好还算是客气的。

sentences.sContent: ‘It wasn’t very easy to find the house.’ ‘That’s got to be the understatement of the year!’
sentences.sCn: “这房子不是很好找。” “那可是说得太轻了！”

words.tran: 低调的；朴素的；轻描淡写的；不夸张的
保守地说；有意轻描淡写
少说，少报；保守地说；有意轻描淡写

trans.tranOther: a statement that is not strong enough to express how good, bad, impressive etc something really is
